questions.text: If I get the chance, I like to play first fiddle in society
In a difficult or controversial situation, I am waiting for support from the closest person
I can easily make decisions in any business
I am very impressionable, it is easy to evoke compassion in me
I can stand up for my authority
I take care of my appearance, and it gives me pleasure
I usually try to adapt to circumstances, not act on my first impulse
Sometimes I flirt with members of the opposite sex
I have great mental strength and independence in my actions
I always carry a mirror with me
I can not only remember a grudge for a long time, but also pay back the same coin
I don't have much self-control and I don't know how to stay cool in any position
I believe that love is an intimate experience that does not need an obligatory external manifestation
I 'm romantic
My character is similar to that of my father

results.text: Mentally-you are one hundred percent female. Today, this is a rare type of person. If you love to cook, do housework and raise children, if you are soft and submissive — you have all the makings to become the embodiment of the male ideal. A real man will accept you for who you are, just because he loves you is enough. If you are a man — your position is unenviable.

Depending on the need, you discover both typically masculine and classically feminine traits, being able to combine softness with determination and impressionability with prudence. It may be that sometimes life circumstances will require you to do things that you consider more appropriate for the opposite sex, but the ability to adapt and greater mental flexibility will be your allies in any circumstances.

Mentally-you are a 100 percent male. Determination, self-reliance, independence-these are your strengths. You know how to be a support for another person and know why you live in this world. Your life principles can command the respect of many people. If you are a man, your answers suggest that your understanding of gender and your own masculinity is somewhat sketchy and stereotypical. But if you are a woman, are you satisfied with yourself?

questions.text: What is your reaction when she (he) speaks on the phone?

answers.text: I immediately ask who the conversation is with
I wait until the conversation is over, and then I ask
I continue to do my job, without attaching any importance to it

questions.text: What do you think about love?

answers.text: A person can fall in love several times, and can sympathize with more than one person at the same time
It would be great if it lasted a lifetime, but this is utopia

questions.text: How do you feel when you have to spend the night out of the house out of necessity?

answers.text: It will be unpleasant for me if the other half uses this to go somewhere to have fun
I will offer the other half something to have fun with
I don't have to think about what my other half is doing at this time

questions.text: Do you open mail addressed to your spouse?

answers.text: Only if they are invoices or other documents

questions.text: What do you think about the past of your other half?

answers.text: You get an unpleasant feeling when you think about people with whom your other half had a relationship before meeting you
You prefer not to delve into these things, as what happened before doesn't matter to you
You've never thought about it before

questions.text: When you need to buy a bed, you...

answers.text: Choose the one that is wider
You give this question to your other half to solve

questions.text: You found your partner in deep thought

answers.text: You will be pleased if these thoughts are about you
You would like to know what your other half is thinking, so what if her thoughts aren't about you at all?
You don't bother yourself with this, because such things don't bother you at all

questions.text: You have sufficient evidence of your spouse's infidelity

answers.text: You will offer to talk openly and understand to the end
You decide to take revenge in the same way
You think that your life is broken, but you suggest that the other half forget everything and return to the family hearth

questions.text: Over time, you notice that your other half is becoming more and more alien to you

answers.text: You think it will pass over time
You are trying to find out for yourself whether you are the reason for this or something else
You start to carefully observe her (his) behavior, check her (his) email, listen to phone conversations, and can even track her (his) on the street

questions.text: During a friendly party, your spouse flirts with others

answers.text: You don't pay any attention to this
You insist on stopping this nonsense
Don't make a drama out of it, but decide to pay more attention to your spouse in the future

questions.text: You will be absent for several days

answers.text: The idea that you may be changed does not occur to you
You call home as often as possible, especially at night
You often ask yourself what she (he) is doing right now. But you think that if you want to change, then you can hardly do anything

questions.text: How do you react to the scene of jealousy?

answers.text: You find the situation funny and inappropriate
You are flattered by this, but more amused by it
The situation makes a fuss, but you feel confident in it

results.text: You are either indifferent to such things, or your half deserves your full trust, and therefore nothing bothers you
You are jealous, but not aggressive
Othello is a baby compared to you. You are an overly domineering person who wants too much

questions.text: Friends told you that they decided to get together in a big company to spend time together, talk and exchange news. Your opinion?

answers.text: Agree and offer to meet at your place
Going to visit someone alone is nothing, but if you get everyone together, it will be too noisy

questions.text: How many friends do you have?

answers.text: You have not yet met a person who can be called your friend

questions.text: You have met friends and are actively exchanging news, but now the moment has come when the information has dried up and the conversation fades to nothing. Your actions?

answers.text: You will always find a topic for a new conversation
You will not wait for everyone to stop talking, but will look for a way to continue the conversation
Wait until everyone is silent and say goodbye

questions.text: In which society do you feel more comfortable?
Your friends are having an argument about something, and this argument threatens to turn into a fight. Your actions?

answers.text: Don't wait for events to unfold and separate your friends
You will only intervene when the dispute reaches a critical point
You won't interfere in the conversation

questions.text: How often do you have a desire to see your friends?
You came to a friend's house and found one of your mutual acquaintances visiting them. Your actions?

answers.text: The more people, the more fun. We could bring a couple more friends and have a little party
You will be happy to stay and spend the evening in a pleasant conversation
Decide that you are interrupted, and despite the owner's persuasions, you will leave, promising to come back in the next few days

questions.text: Friends have come to visit you. Your actions?

answers.text: You will be glad to see them, regardless of what you were doing, because this is an opportunity to relax from your business in a pleasant company
You will be upset because you were not warned in advance and you are not ready for the meeting
You will not show violent emotions about their appearance, although you haven't met them for quite a long time

questions.text: What do meetings with friends give you?

answers.text: Your friends are very dear to you, and you are happy to have any opportunity to spend time in their company
Only in the circle of your friends do you really relax and feel like yourself
These meetings are an opportunity to talk about your problems and either get advice or hear words of sympathy

questions.text: What does the term "true friend" mean to you?

answers.text: This is the person who is happy to see you at any time of the day
This is the one who will come to the rescue in a difficult moment
A person with whom even silence will not be painful

questions.text: The phone rang in your house at two o'clock in the morning. You remove the tube and find out that a friend was abandoned by his wife (girlfriend). Your actions?

answers.text: You will go to comfort a friend
Try to comfort him on the phone
Ask me to call you back in the morning, as I can't understand anything at the moment

questions.text: You have heard rumors that one of your friends is experiencing serious financial difficulties. Are you ready?

answers.text: Immediately go to him and borrow money. If this is not enough, gather the whole company and try to help out your friend
Prepare the money and wait for him to ask for help
You will avoid it until everything is settled

questions.text: How do you behave when communicating with your friends?

answers.text: You can listen carefully to the other person

questions.text: Which holiday is the most convenient for you to invite your friends home for?

answers.text: In order to gather friends, no special occasion is required, since the company gathered together is a holiday in itself
Do not consider it necessary to burden your friends with invitations: if they have a desire to visit you, they will definitely do so

questions.text: How often do you get together as a group?

answers.text: Often. And you are the organizer of such gatherings
Occasionally, when I meet friends on the street. General gatherings are uncharacteristic for us

results.text: The company of friends attracts you little, however, just like any other. This does not mean that you carefully avoid any noisy gatherings. Sometimes you don't mind having fun with your friends, but only sometimes. The point is that your meetings should not exceed the amount of news you can share. Aimless conversations are even more depressing to you than total silence. And meeting just to see familiar faces is not in your habits. Perhaps you don't need a company, because by nature you are what is called a thing itself. Probably, even those people with whom you maintain friendly relations do not have a great craving for communication. And you, in turn, prefer not to bother them once again, so as not to get bored. In short, you are not a big fan of noisy companies and loneliness does not weigh you down

You are not the soul of the company, but in the circle of friends you keep yourself easy and at ease. You give the right to sing solo to others, but if they suddenly ask for your opinion, then support the conversation with pleasure. Socializing with your friends is quite an important part of your existence. And all this despite the fact that you do not actively participate in the conversation. You limit yourself to rare statements and only listen to the arguments and arguments of others. Perhaps your friends believe that a person should be valued not only for the fact that he knows how to make jokes without ceasing. Therefore, your presence is not a heavy burden for others. You, in turn, value your friends as much as they value you.

If you are walking near the house where your friend lives, you do not think that your visit will be inappropriate. It doesn't bother you that you visited a friend as recently as yesterday and nothing significant has happened since then. It doesn't even occur to you that you need at least an excuse to visit a friend, and the fact that you discussed all the news for the week ahead last night doesn't bother you at all: you will still have topics to talk about today. You won't trade the company of your friends for anything. You do not stop even the reproaches of loved ones who complain about your frequent absence. You are one of those people who can show up at a friend's house late at night and, despite being surprised, persuade him to visit "one wonderful place". There, at one of the tables, two friends who have already been woken up by you are sitting, not showing dissatisfaction with such brusqueness. Their belief that the evening won't be wasted is reinforced by your confidence. If you get bored of visiting your friends separately, you will organize a general meeting, which none of the invited guests can refuse. After all, here you are at work, and what you do is never boring. In general, without your friends, you are nowhere, as, in fact, they are without you.

name: Are you a good friend?
description: How attentive and kind are you to your friends? Are you able to sacrifice the latter for the sake of someone who is having a hard time? This test will help you answer these and many other questions.

questions.text: You have a lot of money now. Could you spend it all on gifts to your friends?
A friend told you about his troubles. Let's say you don't care much about it. Will you let him know that?
Your chess partner is weak. Will you sometimes give in to him to make his game more interesting?
Do you often say nice things to people just to make them feel better?
Do you like bad jokes?
Are you vindictive?
Can you be patient and listen to something that doesn't interest you?
Do you know how to put your skills into practice?
When you start losing, do you quit the game?
If you are right, do you refuse to listen to the other side?
Do you willingly fulfill other people's requests?
Will you make fun of someone just to make others have fun?

results.text: Communication with you is sometimes painful even for the most seemingly close people. Try to be more friendly, and then you will have friends: friendship does not tolerate unkind treatment of people

Your kindness is a matter of chance, and you are not kind to everyone. For some, you will go to any lengths, but communication with others is extremely unpleasant for you, and those who do not like you will not be happy with you. This is not entirely bad, just so that people do not take offense at you, try to behave evenly with everyone.

Others like you because you are kind and know how to communicate. You probably have a lot of friends. One word of caution: don't try to please everyone at once. As you know, it is impossible to please everyone, and such behavior will not benefit you.

name: Are you really a reliable friend?
description: Are you really a reliable friend? Or are you one of those who you can rely on not always because of some selfishness?

questions.text: Did you study well?
Are you sure that the school of life has given you the values that are necessary for human development?
Do you think that moral norms are an exaggeration?
Do you link to items?
Were your parents demanding and harsh towards you?
Do you think that success can only be achieved through torment and hard work?
Are you principled?
Do you lose control easily?
Do you often get the idea that you need to live without worrying about the future, just for today?
Are you punctual?
Can you risk anything to achieve the goal?
You promised your friend that one of these days you will provide him with a very valuable service, but you are seriously ill. What are your actions in this situation?

answers.text: Call and apologize because we couldn't fulfill his request
You will consider that the illness is a sufficiently good reason that releases you from your obligations
Ask someone to help you complete the request

questions.text: A friend entrusted you with some big secret of his own. We are talking about an act that you consider strictly negative. Your actions?

answers.text: You try to convince him that he did a bad thing, and help him solve the problem
You don't respond in any way
You share information with people who might influence it

questions.text: Which of the following do you consider the most important female dignity?

results.text: You would really like to be a reliable friend. However, circumstances often turn out in such a way that you do not fulfill the promises made to people. Your friends do not consider you a serious person, because you often commit rash actions, which you later bitterly regret. You have a rich imagination and prefer to live in the present day. You are annoyed by unimaginative people and dry pedants. Punctuality is one of your dreams. It is for this reason that you often have friction with your loved ones and superiors

You like to keep your word, and your friends can always count on you at the right moment. However, absolute reliability is not your only trait: you are loved by the environment because of your character. In principle, you can miss the train, forget to do something on time, or not remember in time about some small matter. However, you always manage to correct these errors
Violent emotions do not affect your decisions in any way. You are always responsible for your words and actions. However, as you will admit, it is certainly not easy to be so reliable

Your most important trait is reliability, you can rely on you in any circumstances, but you demand the same from others. And this is expressed in a somewhat categorical form. Your carefully thought-out approach to work, orderly lifestyle, deep thoughts before solving any life tasks cause others not only admiration, but also feelings such as envy and fear

name: Are you touchy?
description: This test will help you determine whether you are touchy or, on the contrary, tolerance itself

questions.text: Do you remember the abuser or offense for a long time?
How long have you been experiencing caustic comments, unfriendly looks, dirty trousers or other minor troubles?
Do you often have a state where you don't want to talk to anyone?
Are you easily distracted by extraneous noises or conversations?
Can you analyze your feelings, experiences, and actions for a long time?
Do you often act under the influence of a momentary mood?
Do you often have nightmares or unpleasant dreams?
Does it occur to you that you are worse than others?
Do you often have mood swings?
Does it happen that during an argument in your voice suddenly appear unusual in the normal state of the tone?
Is it easy to make you lose your temper and make you scream?
If you have a bad mood, even very delicious food can't fix it?
Do you get annoyed if someone doesn't understand you?

results.text: You are not only touchy, but also vindictive, your mood changes quickly, and you react very painfully to the attitude of others to your person. This is a serious flaw in your character, and you just need to address it.

You can be called slightly touchy. And this trait of character brings you a lot of grief. Under the influence of emotions, you can easily say rude things to the abuser, which is why you often run into a conflict.

It is difficult to call you touchy, because the state of your soul is usually stable and changes only depending on the situation. Maybe someone even thinks you're hard-headed or impenetrable. Sometimes they envy you, sometimes they judge you, but you don't pay any attention to it.

name: Is it pleasant to communicate with you?
description: Many people find it difficult to look at themselves from the outside. This test will allow you to find out if you are pleasant in communication

questions.text: Do you like listening more than talking?
Do you always immediately know how to find a common topic of conversation with a stranger?
Do you always listen carefully to the other person?
Do you like to give your advice to the other person, even if they don't ask you for it?
If the topic of your conversation is very uninteresting to you, will you show it to your interlocutor?
Do you get very annoyed if people don't listen to you?
Do you have an opinion on any issue?
If the topic of the conversation is unfamiliar to you, will you develop it?
Do you like being the center of attention?
Are there at least two or three subjects in which your knowledge is strong enough?
Are you really a good speaker?

results.text: It is difficult to determine who you really are: a silent person, from whom you will not get a word out, or, I'm sorry, a talker, and they try to avoid you. However, the facts stubbornly suggest that communicating with you is not very pleasant, and sometimes even difficult.

You are not a very sociable person, but you are always quite a pleasant and attentive interlocutor. If you are not in a good mood, you can be very absent-minded, but at these moments you do not demand increased attention from others to your own person.

In communication, you are probably a very pleasant person. Your friends probably can't do without you. All this is wonderful, but the question arises: is your mission really pleasant for you, or does it sometimes turn into a role and you have to play it diligently, like an actor on stage?

name: Are you tolerant of your friends?

questions.text: You suddenly had a very interesting idea, in your opinion, but for some reason your friends did not support it. Will you be very upset?
You met up with friends, and one of you suggested starting the game. What are your preferences?

answers.text: You want only good players to participate in the game
You want everyone to play, even those who don't know the rules yet

questions.text: Do you take unpleasant news calmly?
Are you annoyed by people who allow themselves to appear in public places drunk?

answers.text: If they behave within the bounds of decency, you are not interested in it
You don't like people who can't control themselves

questions.text: Can you easily find a common language with people of a different profession, customs or position?

answers.text: It's hard for you to do this
You don't pay attention to such differences

questions.text: Your reaction to the joke that targeted you

answers.text: You didn't like either the joke or the jokers
If the joke is unpleasant to you, you will respond in the same manner

questions.text: Do you agree with the statements that some people are "doing the wrong thing" or "sitting in the wrong place"?
You bring a friend to your company who immediately becomes an object of attention. Your reaction?

answers.text: This is unpleasant for you, as they pay less attention to you now
You are only too happy for him

questions.text: On a visit, you met an elderly person who criticizes the younger generation and praises the old days. Your actions?

answers.text: You will leave earlier under a plausible excuse

results.text: You are inflexible and apparently stubborn. No matter what environment you are in, it seems that you are trying your best to impose your own opinion on others. And it doesn't bother you that you often raise your voice to achieve your goal. With this type of character, it is difficult to maintain relationships with people who disagree with your vision of the world

You always firmly defend your beliefs. It is not difficult for you to conduct a dialogue, changing your opinion if necessary. However, in some cases, you are harsh and may show disrespect to the other person. At such times, it is not difficult for you to win an argument with a person with a weaker character.

Your beliefs are quite firm, but they perfectly "get along" with the flexibility and subtlety of the mind. You are ready to accept any idea or treat with enviable understanding to an out-of-the-ordinary act, even when they do not appeal to you. You are critical of your own opinion and have great tact and respect for the other person.

name: How selfish are you towards your friends?

questions.text: Do you think that everything in this world has its price?
Are you addicted to a particular color?
Are you making fun of yourself?
Are you liked in society?
Do you always give in to friendly arguments?
Do you know how to hide illnesses and failures from your friends?
Do you always write down the debts of all your friends and acquaintances?
Do you like to speak loudly?
Do you know the price of people well?
Do you agree that a savings account with a bank is an unnecessary thing?
Do you think that fate has passed you by?
Do you enjoy the failures of your enemies?

results.text: You have a very uneven character: at times you are selfish, but sometimes your friends are amazed by your selflessness
You are a sympathetic person who willingly helps others
You are selfish, and there is little warmth in your relationships with your few friends
You are a complete egoist

name: Is it easy for you to connect with people?
description: How easily do you connect with people? Do you feel at ease in any environment? Do you belong to the category of people who can be said to be easy to communicate with? The test will help you answer all these questions. In addition, it will allow you to determine how much this character trait is expressed in you.

questions.text: Are you often invited to parties, home banquets, anniversaries, weddings, birthdays and other celebrations?

answers.text: No holiday is complete without you, friends and acquaintances are sure to invite you to visit
You are invited regularly, but not very often
You don't like noisy parties at all, so no one invites you anywhere

questions.text: Will you be able to quickly get used to an unfamiliar company and feel at ease?

answers.text: This is one of your main features
Only if you are in the mood
No, your friends disliked you from school for being unsociable and secretive

questions.text: You suddenly found yourself in the center of attention. What are your feelings?

answers.text: You are curious, but you feel out of place
Ready to sink through the ground: you don't like the fact that everyone is looking at you

questions.text: This is your first time performing in front of an unfamiliar audience. What are your feelings?

answers.text: You are confused, and this feeling gradually turns into an unaccountable fear
You are either calm or pleasantly excited

questions.text: Do you like to entertain others and, if so, do you manage to be the soul of the company?

answers.text: Yes, you like to entertain people and can be the soul of any company
It all depends on the company and your mood
You don't like to attract the attention of others

questions.text: Is it difficult for you to ask a stranger to show you the way?

answers.text: You will not ask anyone until you are absolutely sure that you are lost
You can ask, but you will feel awkward
This is not a problem for you: if necessary, you will ask for help immediately

questions.text: Do you like to joke in the company?

answers.text: Yes, this is a good way to lighten the atmosphere: guests become more friendly
Yes, but only sometimes, on occasion
You don't tell me anything yourself, but you like to listen

questions.text: Can we say about you that you always find something to answer and quickly choose your words?

answers.text: Yes, this is a feature of your character
It all depends on the situation
This statement is clearly not about you

questions.text: You are going to meet someone you don't know much or don't even know at all. Do you feel the need to have someone you know well, someone you can trust?

answers.text: Yes. When a friend is around, you feel more confident
Not always, but in some cases it can be very useful
No, you're only thinking about the meeting

questions.text: You have met a lovely girl (guy), but, unfortunately, could not get a date. Your thoughts?

answers.text: It's okay. We don't know which of us was luckier. Let's try it another time and in a different place
I will never try to make a date with anyone again

results.text: To put it mildly, you are not as easy to communicate as you would like. But you're not silent, either. You're just too self-absorbed, and that's your character and temperament. However, some isolation does not prevent your friends from respecting you and loving you

You are a dual nature. You behave like an extremely shy person and are often surprised at how naturally and easily you can fit into any company. Unfortunately, you prefer to communicate with people only at your own request. Therefore, in some companies you feel out of place. And in order for you to feel comfortable, you need something that would encourage you to communicate

Such epithets as "charming","artistic","darling"and"charming" refer specifically to you. You belong not only among your own people, but also among others. By entertaining others with enviable ease, you feel the need to please everyone without exception and impress everyone at once. What is most interesting, you do it, and not obsessively, but very naturally

name: How much do your friends like you?

questions.text: You must always remember that you are evaluated by those with whom you communicate
You should feel independent enough to discuss your hobby with your friends. In this case, you won't care if they share your passion or not
The most important thing is to maintain a sense of self-esteem, and even at a time when there is a temptation to do otherwise
If you notice an error in another person's speech, you should definitely correct them
If you have met strangers, you must look sociable, attractive and witty in order to make an impression of a very interesting person
If you were introduced to another person and you didn't catch their name, ask them to repeat it
Are you sure that your friends respect you just because you don't let people make fun of you?
You must always be on your guard, otherwise others may start making fun of you, making you look like a caricature
If your interlocutor is a person who shines with wit, you should not compete with him at all. You'll just give him his due and get out of this conversation
You should always make sure that your behavior is consistent with the general mood of the company where you are located
You should always help your friends, as circumstances may be such that you will need their help
You don't need to provide too many services to others, because very few people can appreciate this behavior
It is better for others to depend on you than for you to get into a dependent position
A true friend will always help
You should show only the best qualities so that others will approve of them, praise you and appreciate you
If someone tells a joke that you have known for a long time, you will immediately stop the narrator
If someone in the company tells a joke that you have already heard for a long time, you need to be polite enough to laugh at it together with everyone else

If you are invited to visit, but on this day you want to go to the cinema, then you should not offend the person who invited you. It is best to say that you have a headache or come up with another reason, but do not tell your friend the real reason for refusing
True friends should always demand that their relatives and friends do what they want, and sometimes even against their will
You should not persistently defend your interests when someone expresses the opposite opinion

results.text: You should think very seriously about your life: it is very difficult to treat a constrained and withdrawn person with sympathy. Your strong desire to be a respected and serious person is clear to everyone. However, you live in constant tension, constantly waiting for an accidental undermining of authority or a trick from others. You should relax and allow yourself a certain amount of humor and irony in relation to your person. Then you will see how quickly your life will change for the better.

Your friends are friendly to you, as you are always friendly, good-natured and open to communication. However, loving friendly communication and warm company, you believe that only the sun can warm everyone at once. If necessary, you forget about friendship and make them feel distant. In this case, it is not without conflicts, but you can successfully solve such problems.

Nature has generously rewarded you with charm: wherever you are, you are always accompanied by universal approval and adoration. It's hard to say what exactly attracts more people to you: the ability to understand the situation, a charming smile, the ability to sympathize with the interlocutor, or just love for your neighbor. In any case, you are guaranteed the "position" of everyone's favorite

name: Are you a good friend?
description: Everyone wants their friend to be a reliable person, on whom you can rely in everything. Answer the test questions and you will see how much you meet the requirements that you tend to make others. In addition, it is interesting to find out for yourself what kind of friend you are-reliable or not so reliable.

questions.text: You know a lot of sensitive and very funny stories about one of your friends. How will you use this information?

answers.text: You'll be happy to tell anyone who listens to it
Tell us, but without mentioning names

questions.text: One of your friends often borrows things, but never returns them. At the moment, they want to borrow an expensive gadget from you. Your actions?

answers.text: You will lie and say that you don't have it

questions.text: If your friend accidentally ruined something very expensive for you – a rare statuette, watch. Your actions?

answers.text: You will say that you were just going to buy a new one
Ask your friend to pay the cost

questions.text: You found out that a friend is in a relationship with a person you hate. Your actions?

answers.text: You won't say anything to him and will maintain friendly relations as if nothing has happened
Give your friend an ultimatum: either you or that person

questions.text: You feel that your friend is going to be in big trouble soon. Your actions?

answers.text: Break off relations with him so that these troubles do not affect you
Talk to them openly, give them advice or warn them
You will be friends with him as before

questions.text: How do you think a true friend should behave?

answers.text: Keep your problems and thoughts to yourself

questions.text: Your friend needs financial help, and you have enough money to help him. Your actions?

answers.text: Ask me to take money to give you pleasure
Ask your friend to remember how many times he helped you, and say that your service is nothing compared to his help
You refuse the request because you think that you need to save money

questions.text: You need to borrow money from a friend. Your actions?

answers.text: You will not ask him yourself, hoping that he will figure it out and offer you help

questions.text: A friend bought a suit that doesn't suit him. Your actions?

answers.text: You will express your opinion openly
Explain why this purchase was not very successful

questions.text: How would you describe a friend?

answers.text: He is more intelligent than you
You are more intelligent than he is
You and your friend are about on the same level

results.text: You pay more attention to yourself than to others. This character trait is an obstacle to true friendship. Do not forget the old aphorism: "To have a good friend, you need to be one yourself."

questions.text: Do you cry when you are overwhelmed with emotions after watching a movie or program with a happy ending?
Do you think your brain controls your heart or your heart controls your brain?

results.text: Although the number of points you have scored suggests that you are rather a tough person, it may well be that under this hard shell hides a good heart. You are probably deliberately being tough and overly firm because you don't want to show weakness and are afraid of appearing soft-hearted. At the same time, you are not exactly romantic or sentimental. But that doesn't stop you from building long and strong relationships and having a loving family, so that people will respect you, accept you for who you are, and admire your integrity. You are an honest and direct person, but it will be good for you and for the people around you if you remember that everyone has their own feelings, and try not to hurt them.

In general, you are a kind person, ready to do a lot for the sake of other people, although, perhaps, your kindness and kindheartedness are not visible at first glance — they are hidden in the depths of your soul. And you benefit from this: after all, you are firm enough to carry out your own plans and achieve your own goals in life, but at the same time you remain a kind, caring and loving person. Like most people, you are a soft person at heart.

You are an extremely romantic and caring person, you are very touched by the feelings of other people, you even worry about the fate of those about whom the newspapers write, and to such an extent that sometimes you feel guilty that you can't rush to their aid right now. But just because you're so gentle and caring doesn't mean that everyone around you loves and respects you. Some, on the contrary, may use your kindness for their own purposes, especially if you find it difficult to say a no to people

questions.text: Are you happy with your life?

results.text: You definitely can't be called a person who wants to control everything, rather, on the contrary. That is, in general, you have a very easy approach to life, you are ready to go with the flow, and this completely suits you. The only problem is that you can fall under someone else's influence and even let others control your life. Therefore, try not to let anyone manipulate you and guide your actions, because you are the master of your own life, and only you can decide how to live it.

You are in the most advantageous position: you can not be called a "dictator", but you are not the one who will allow others to control you. It seems that it is very important for you to live in harmony with others. You are convinced that one head is good, but two are better. You believe that it is much easier to solve a problem together than alone, and that decisions made together will bring more benefits than those that we would make on our own.

The points you have scored suggest that you are a person who wants to control everything tightly. It's good that you have control over your life, but it's probably worth slowing down a little before your eternal desire to impose your own habits, tastes, and lifestyle on the world turns into an obsession; in other words, before the desire for control goes beyond reason. It's great that you plan your own life and take full responsibility for it, but do not forget that life is a team game, in which we are quite dependent on the help, love, respect and friendship of other people. We can't expect the whole world to revolve around us; and so we have to be able, in some cases, to give up control of circumstances and just go with the flow.

questions.text: Have you ever had to go out of your way to make friends with people you thought were the 'right people'?

questions.text: Would you be able to communicate well with someone you despise if it helped you advance your career?

results.text: although the test result indicates that you are not a careerist, this does not mean that you have not achieved and will never achieve success in your chosen profession. For many people, a career is what defines them. This is not your case, your job is just one of the many components of your personality. Who we become in life and how we behave largely depends on what motivates us. For you, the main driving force will be happiness and fulfillment of your potential, rather than success in your career. While many people find their happiness in a brilliant career, for you, it may be a strong family and a stable job that does not involve too much responsibility and brings regular income. No one can be happy if they are forced to be something they don't really want to be.

You are a careerist, but within reasonable limits. Although your career plays an important role in your life, family values still come first. You believe that it is strong family ties that can give you happiness and a sense of stability, thanks to the family you have a desire to achieve your goals, and this is more important for you than your career. In addition to your family and career, you have other interests and hobbies in your life and are able to use your free time effectively. PVAs, in all likelihood, can be described as a person who is proud of his work and has certain ambitions in life. So if you have an opportunity to advance in your career, you will not miss it, but you will never fight hard for promotion, because your career is not the main role in your value system. The ability to maintain the right balance between career, family and everything else allows you to make the most of everything you have planned, both in your personal and professional life.

Your result indicates that you are a real career developer and, perhaps, career is the main component of your life. You will do everything in your power to succeed in your career. Career not only determines the way you live your life, you expect to use it to achieve well-being and, perhaps, even fame for yourself and your family. The difficulty lies in the fact that a person who is so absorbed in his own career forgets that there are other important things in life. Sometimes careerists, achieving heights in the profession, invest so much time and effort in their work that they become dependent on it and turn into real workaholics.

questions.text: How easily can you recover from a personal tragedy?

answers.text: It is extremely difficult for me, it is a long and painful process for me
I try to move on with my life, but in reality, no one can fully recover from a heavy loss or tragedy
It's not easy. But nevertheless, I try to put it in the past as soon as possible and move on with my life

questions.text: Do you go to well-known places to maintain old acquaintances and enjoy pleasant memories?
Which of the listed qualities, in your opinion, is your strong point?
How do you feel about the fact that the company you work for is constantly introducing new technologies into the workflow?

answers.text: I always worry about this, because I'm much more comfortable working with what I'm already used to and what I know well

I understand that in the modern world you can't do without new technologies, because otherwise you can't stay competitive, but sometimes I'm afraid that I won't be able to understand the new technology
I'm all for it, it's exciting and interesting changes for me

questions.text: Do you think your school years were the happiest stage of your life?

answers.text: In general, no, although I still have pleasant memories of my school years

questions.text: Have you ever managed to master a new device so well that you could even help other people understand it?

results.text: It seems that you are negative about any changes and do not particularly try to keep up with the times. There is also reason to assume that you are not interested in new technologies, perhaps because you find it tedious to understand them. You constantly look back, remembering past times that seem so much better to you than the present, so you can be called a sentimental person. Most likely, you are pining and constantly remember a certain period of your life when everything was good and all the changes were only for the better. But if you now make an effort to change your worldview even a little, and try to find good moments in the present tense, then the future will appear to you in much more optimistic colors. And then, perhaps, the good times will return, and many years later, looking back, you will remember the present days with joy. Never forget that it is never too late to learn. Technological progress is going at a furious pace, but in most cases, technical innovations make life easier for us, rather than complicate it. So we have a choice: either we become part of the modern world with its technological progress, or we ignore the changes that are taking place and do not use the advantages provided to us.

Memories of the past and past experiences make us who we are now. It is the accumulated experience that allows us to make certain decisions today and forms the foundation on which we can build our future. The number of points you get indicates that you keep up with the times, are used to making plans for the future, follow the development of new technologies, but at the same time cherish your memories and past. You are in the most favorable position: you are not afraid of changes and do not give up on new technologies that will inevitably appear as a result of these changes. You are optimistic about the future, and at the same time with light sadness remember the past times.Other than that, you think that everything in your life has turned out as it should, and therefore there is no need to change anything, even if many people, such as friends, parents, teachers or colleagues, are constantly trying to teach you how to live. But in the end, this is your own life, and only you can decide how to live it. Any goals matter only if they are important to you, and you and only you should determine which path to choose and what to strive for.

You seem to be a person who always keeps up with the times without looking back. This means that you are boldly moving forward and making lots of plans for the future, no matter how old you are. You try to take any changes in your life positively; you are happy to implement your plans, which you always have in abundance, and the thought of opportunities opening up in the future excites the blood.In addition, you are very interested in all new technologies and you want that no new invention that has appeared on the market will pass you by. But in our time, technological progress is gaining such momentum that almost no one can keep up with it at least one step. So don't be discouraged if you suddenly find out that you don't know anything about any technical innovation, or it turns out that the computer you purchased just six months ago is no longer considered the most modern and powerful model. Your philosophy is that a person should constantly move forward and develop, no matter how old they are.

name: How well you handle critical circumstances

questions.text: How important is it for you to succeed?

answers.text: I'm not particularly worried about this

questions.text: How often did you have to take a break from work due to stress?
Do you think that others consider you someone who is able to keep cool in crisis situations?

answers.text: Partly, but often those who keep their cool during a crisis don't really understand the situation
Yes, I think that's how others perceive me

questions.text: What do you think will help you relieve stress and relax after a particularly hard day at the office?

answers.text: Take a nap for a couple of hours in your favorite chair
A little whiskey or other alcoholic beverage

questions.text: Do you agree that in the modern world people are experiencing much more pressure than, say, 40 years ago?
Unexpectedly, due to family circumstances, you were asked to look after your nephew's three naughty children over the weekend. How will you feel about it?

answers.text: Just thinking about it makes me terrified, so I'll probably try to give up somehow
I will gladly accept this challenge

questions.text: Have you ever broken things due to extreme stress and stress?

answers.text: I don't really care. If I have to deal with unfamiliar equipment, for example, at work, then I will most likely be able to cope with it well
I'm a little concerned about this
I'm interested in this, I enjoy the process

questions.text: What is the main meaning of the weekend for you?

answers.text: This is a time when I have the opportunity to spend more time with my friends and family
This is a time when I don't have to work as hard as on other days of the week. But I don't have the ability to completely disconnect from work
This is a time when I can afford emotional and psychological rest

questions.text: How do you feel when your home is being renovated or any other changes are taking place?

answers.text: I don't feel quite comfortable, especially if it interferes with my normal lifestyle
I am happy about this, sometimes I feel excited, it depends on what exactly is happening

questions.text: Do you have friends that you completely trust and communicate with very often?

answers.text: I would say that the struggle for existence in the modern world is a little stronger than it was a generation or two ago
The intensity of the struggle for existence is the same as it was before

questions.text: Do you ever discuss your feelings with other people?
Do you think that a person should give their best?

answers.text: Yes, this is the best way to achieve success in life
No, life is too short for that

questions.text: How do you feel if you have to perform several tasks at the same time?

answers.text: I prefer to do one job
I prefer to perform several tasks at the same time

questions.text: How often do you get upset and angry with yourself when you make a mistake or things don't go as planned?

answers.text: Sometimes, as I assume all other people do
Probably more often than other people
Probably less often than other people

questions.text: Have you ever taken medication to cope with stress?
Have you ever been sick yourself due to the death or illness of your loved ones?

answers.text: No, but it's possible, I just wasn't in that situation
No, I coped with losses — I had to suffer and grieve, like all of us, but my own health did not suffer

questions.text: Have you ever experienced stress while taking exams?

answers.text: I worry about exams, but not more than any other person

questions.text: Does the thought of routine household chores, such as washing dishes or mowing the lawn, make you nervous?

answers.text: Not unnerving, although such cases can sometimes be annoying

questions.text: Is it easy for you to completely disconnect from business, forget about everything for a while and completely relax?

answers.text: Sometimes I find it difficult to disconnect
I was lucky, at the right moment I can very easily disconnect from all problems

questions.text: How often have you experienced such intense tension that it seemed impossible to cope with it?

answers.text: More often than I would like

questions.text: Imagine being stuck in a traffic jam. Which of the feelings will prevail?
Do you feel more or less stressed as you get older?

answers.text: In general, I like the house in which we live now, but perhaps moving also has its advantages
Moving is an unbearably difficult task that should be abandoned if possible
Moving involves a lot of difficult work, but in general it is a joyful event that is worth planning and looking forward to

questions.text: How often did your sex life suffer due to stress or difficulties at work?

answers.text: There were only a few similar cases
This has happened more than a couple of times

questions.text: Have you ever experienced stress due to the fact that you refused, for example, caffeine?

results.text: The number of points scored shows that stressful situations and difficulties negatively affect you. Since the norms of behavior in society often do not allow you to release emotions, for example, in a rude or cruel way, and also do not allow you to simply escape from an unpleasant situation, the tension inside you gradually accumulates, you become more vulnerable and experience severe stress. At such moments, existing problems are likely to appear to you many times more terrible than they really are. So you should remind yourself more often that most of the things we worry about will never happen, that many of our problems are solved fairly quickly, and that if we deal with difficulties intelligently and calmly, they will not leave any terrible traces in our lives. In fact, we are not the first to face difficulties and stressful situations; all people in the world at one time or another have to solve certain problems. You should also clearly understand that intense stress leads to stress, and because of it, various diseases arise. Therefore, it is very important to learn how to behave correctly in a critical situation: you need to take a step back, look from the outside at your problems, at your life in general, and try to find positive moments in it — and there will probably be many of them.Most importantly, try to form a more positive attitude towards life. It is said that in the modern world, people experience great stress, but in reality, life has never been easy, and previous generations also had to contend with many difficulties. Modern research and techniques should help us deal with problems better than people have done in the past. After all, we are now aware of the dangers of stressful situations.You should always analyze your problems, look for the cause or causes of your stress, learn to respond correctly, and find your own ways to deal with stress. You may also want to change your attitude to stress and difficulties, work on your behavior, for example, in work situations, find places where you can ask for help at the right time, and find the right people with whom you can discuss all the problems.In addition, it is very important to take care of yourself at a time when you have to solve important problems, not only for your own well-being, but also for the sake of those close to you. This can be done in different ways, for example: doing what is necessary at the moment, and do some fun things that will bring pleasure to you and your families; up be too hard on yourself, we all make mistakes; allow yourself a break; try to relax and sleep more; keep yourself in good physical shape; eat and drink as much as you need; do not forget about their own interests.

Although sometimes you have to deal with situations that cause you stress and excitement, these are the exceptions rather than the rule, and more importantly, such situations never drag on. So you can disconnect from all the problems when you need to, and you don't go out of your way to get too far in life. You're in a pretty good position: you are able to cope with yourself in times of stress and tension, but at the same time you can always refuse if you are offered conditions that are too difficult for you.

The points scored indicate that you are very good at acting in critical situations. Most likely, people around you think you are incredibly confident and very balanced person. You are able to keep almost any situation under your control. The only thing you should warn a person who has such valuable qualities is that he should still be prepared to face stressful situations that will make even him nervous, because in life this, unfortunately, is inevitable. In other words, you need to think about how you will act in times of stress, and understand that any unexpected situations are possible in life. Also, don't forget: some tension can even be beneficial, because difficulties force people to come together and show all their strengths.

name: Self-control in communication
description: With this test you can determine your level of control when dealing with other people

questions.text: seems to Me a difficult art to imitate the habits of other people
I would probably pretend to be stupid to attract attention or amuse others
I could make a good actor
Other people sometimes think I'm experiencing something more deeply than it really is
I rarely find myself in the center of attention in the company
In different situations and in communication with different people, I often behave completely differently
I can only stand up for what I am sincerely convinced of
In order to succeed in business and in relationships with people, I try to be what they expect me to be
I can be friendly with people I can't stand
I'm not always what I seem

results.text: You have low communicative control, i.e. your behavior is stable and you do not consider it necessary to change depending on the situation. You are capable of sincere disclosure in communication, which is why some consider you "uncomfortable" because of your straightforwardness
You have average communication control. You are sincere, but not restrained in your emotional manifestations. However, you take into account the people around you in your behavior
You have high communicative control. You easily enter into any role, react flexibly to changes in the situation, feel well and can anticipate the impression you make on others

name: Demonstrativeness test
description: The purpose of this test is to identify the level of demonstrativeness of the subject. Demonstrativeness is a complex, multifaceted characteristic. This and the desire to "show off", the pleasure of bringing positive attention to his personality.

questions.text: do You have periods of such concern that it was hard to sit still?
Do you often feel as if you have done something wrong or wrong?
Are you in the spotlight in the campaign?
Have you ever had conflicts and troubles that exhausted you so much that you didn't go to work or study?
Is it possible to say that there are a lot of interesting things in your daily life?
Would you like to study now (or are you already doing) in an artistic or theatrical amateur?
Do you care what others think about you?
Does nausea and vomiting bother you at times?
Are you always straightforward with your friends?
Do you rarely have a headache?
Can you be friendly with people without revealing your true relationship to them?
Is it difficult for you to maintain a conversation with a person you just met?
Are you always diligent about your activities?
Do you think your family life is no worse than most of your friends?
Does it sometimes happen that you want to swear?
Do you have a good appetite?
Can you easily distract yourself from burdensome questions and not think about them?
Do you think you are too shy?
Is it true that your health has been mostly good in recent years?
Would it be difficult for you to perform on stage in front of a large audience?
Do you often have a strong heartbeat?
Is it harder for you to concentrate than most people?
Is it true that you often can't understand why you were in a bad mood and annoyed the day before?
Can I say that you have never felt better than now?
Could you, if you had to participate in a theatrical performance, enter the role with full penetration and reincarnation and forget about yourself?
Can you easily adapt to a new situation?
Do you usually feel in the morning that you slept and rested?
Are you willing to recite poetry?
Do you think that a lot of people exaggerate their misfortunes in order to get sympathy and help?
Have your eyesight deteriorated recently?
Can I say about you that you are hot-tempered, but outgoing?
Is it difficult for you to cause self-pity, even when you really feel bad?
Do you feel general weakness most of the time?
Are you usually satisfied with your fate?
Are you sometimes prone to states of intense inner anxiety, longing?
Can you tell the most boring story so emotionally and vividly that they will listen to you with their mouths agape?

results.text:
Low level of demonstrativeness. The subject has problems with self-expression. Sometimes he gets too hung up on negative experiences.

 Hard to get along with other people. In communication, he is dry and emotionless.

Average, normal level of demonstrativeness. There are no problems with self-expression.

 is not inclined to repress negative experiences, but also does not fixate on them. He doesn't get along with other people too quickly, but he also never finds himself in social isolation. In communication, he is quite emotional, but does not overplay.

High level of demonstrativeness. Artistry and a penchant for theatrical effects. Negative experiences are easily displaced. Facts are ignored, appeal to feelings prevails.

 Quickly converges with other people. When communicating a lot of emotions, often overplays.

Very high level of demonstrativeness. Artistry combined with fantasy often leads to severe problems in interpersonal communication. Real tantrums often occur.

 Inclination to psychosomatic disorders. Rationally, evidently, he is practically unable to reason.

 He is easily convinced of something if you show your sympathy for him. Ignoring is very hard to take.
